templates.name: File Organization
templates.description: Organize files in a folder by type and date
templates.prompt: Please organize the files in this folder by type and date. Create subfolders for different file types (documents, images, videos, etc.) and sort files chronologically.

templates.name: Business Card Data Extraction
templates.description: Extract information from business card images and create a spreadsheet
templates.prompt: Extract information from all business card images in this folder and create an Excel file with the following columns: Name, Name (Romaji), Company, Position, Phone, Email, and Image Filename. Process images in parallel if possible.

templates.name: Code Analysis
templates.description: Analyze code structure and generate documentation
templates.prompt: Analyze the code in this repository and generate a comprehensive documentation including: 1) Project structure overview, 2) Main components and their purposes, 3) Key functions and classes, 4) Dependencies and their usage.

templates.name: Receipt to Expense Report
templates.description: Extract data from receipt images and create expense report
templates.prompt: Extract information from all receipt images in this folder and create an expense report with columns: Date, Vendor, Category, Amount, Payment Method, and Receipt Image. Calculate total expenses by category.

templates.name: Document Summary
templates.description: Summarize multiple documents into a single report
templates.prompt: Read all documents in this folder and create a comprehensive summary report highlighting: 1) Main topics covered, 2) Key points from each document, 3) Common themes, 4) Action items if any.

templates.name: Photo Organization
templates.description: Organize photos by date and event
templates.prompt: Organize photos in this folder by date and event. Create subfolders with descriptive names based on photo content and metadata. Rename files with meaningful names including date.

templates.name: Code Review
templates.prompt: Review the code in this folder and provide: 1) Code quality assessment, 2) Potential bugs or issues, 3) Performance optimization suggestions, 4) Best practices recommendations, 5) Security considerations.

templates.name: Data Cleanup
templates.prompt: Clean and standardize all data files in this folder: 1) Remove duplicates, 2) Fix formatting issues, 3) Standardize field names, 4) Validate data consistency, 5) Generate a cleanup report.

templates.name: Meeting Notes Summary
templates.description: Summarize meeting notes and extract action items
templates.prompt: Summarize all meeting notes in this folder and create a report with: 1) Key discussion points, 2) Decisions made, 3) Action items with owners, 4) Follow-up topics, 5) Timeline overview.
